org.apache.ignite.lang

Interface IgniteRunnable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Runnable, Serializable

    public interface IgniteRunnable
extends Runnable, Serializable
    Grid-aware adapter for Runnable implementations. It adds Serializable interface to Runnable object. Use this class for executing distributed computations on the grid, like in IgniteCompute.run(IgniteRunnable) method.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface java.lang.Runnable

        run
